mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from users order by user_ desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select rank,user_tear tear,user_image image,user_name name,user_money money,user_win win,user_lose lose from (select DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY user_win DESC) rank ,rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from users order by user_win desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
